title: I'm Still Here
author: Sia
lyrics:
[00:06.60] I'm fighting a battle
[00:12.12] I'm fighting my shadow

[00:28.92] I'm fighting my ego
[00:34.56] Lost youth where did we go wrong

[00:45.89] I'm lighting the long way home
[00:49.25] Oh, the past, it haunted me
